name: Permanent mark
description:
This is a zombie style tower defense game that is easy to learn and suitable for people of all ages.



The game has various levels and unique defense towers. As the game progresses, levels will gradually be unlocked and new defense towers will also be obtained. In addition, the difficulty of the game will gradually increase.

Players can build defense towers on both sides of the path that zombies must pass through to kill them.

The player's task is to kill zombies
